items.content_html: Client uses the acronym FTL for First Time Login. Every time I see it, I think Faster Than Light – now that is an analytics event I’d be excited about!
items.content_text: Client uses the acronym `FTL` for First Time Login. Every time I see it, I think Faster Than Light -- now that is an analytics event I'd be excited about!

items.content_html: I love the colors of fall. While they mean a slide toward winter, the colors feel so alive and full of energy. Truth be told, when I was younger I very much hoped to live somewhere with changing seasons. It is one of the many things that, in reality, ends up being even better than you hoped.
